snippet.title: UnderMine 2 - Official Announcement Teaser Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase
snippet.description: Here's your look at the announcement teaser trailer for UnderMine 2, an upcoming sequel to the action-adventure roguelike game, UnderMine. UnderMine 2 takes dungeon crawling to a whole new level. Players can invite a friend and tackle the entire adventure together, navigating dangerous combat encounters, solving puzzles, and rescuing new playable characters. UnderMine 2 is coming to PC.
